name: Yagami Hiroki no Game-Taste: Munasawagi no Yokan
overview: Yagami Hiroki no Game-Taste - Munasawagi no Yokan is a dating simulation game in which the player takes the role of a Japanese student that goes to study to the USA and also got a part time job in an advertising agency. The games takes place from April until August and during weeks the player's character only can go out after his job. So there is few time to talk to different people. Weekends is another story he can date girl but before doing that he have to meet them in his job or outside his job going around different places and talking with them, if he likes how your character reacts and how he is maybe you can ask her for a date. There are different places to go, like shops, arcades, parks, pools, etc. There are at least 6 different girls (with each own tastes and jobs: nurse, waitress, salary woman, etc.) to date and different kind of reactions that they will do depending of the player's choices. The character designs are made by Hiroki Yagami.
